item.title: Mitch's Musings
item.description: God is with us in every day lfe.
item.itunes:author: Mitchell Brink
item.itunes:subtitle: God is with us in every day lfe.

item.title: Seeing the Unseen
item.description: All things are possible with God.
item.itunes:author: Mitchell Brink
item.itunes:subtitle: All things are possible with God.

item.title: Holy Wheat
item.description: We are called to be holy wheat, set apart in how we live, even among the weeds of the world.
item.itunes:author: Mitchell Brink
item.itunes:subtitle: We are called to be holy wheat, set apart in how we live, even among the weeds of the world.

item.title: No Other Gods
item.description: You shall have no other gods before me.
item.itunes:author: Mitchell Brink
item.itunes:subtitle: You shall have no other gods before me.

item.title: A Noun When We're Expecting a Verb
item.description: Jesus said he is the way. We look at how Jesus is a verb.
item.itunes:author: Mitchell Brink
item.itunes:subtitle: Jesus said he is the way. We look at how Jesus is a verb.

item.title: Two Sermons for the Price of One!
item.description: Peter preached that we must repent and be baptized.
item.itunes:author: Mitchell Brink
item.itunes:subtitle: Peter preached that we must repent and be baptized.

item.title: Promises You Can Trust
item.description: Abram was just a typical man obedient to God's call.
item.itunes:author: Mitchell Brink
item.itunes:subtitle: Abram was just a typical man obedient to God's call.

item.title: Opening the Box
item.description: Matthew shows how Jesus broke out of the box which humanity had made for him.
item.itunes:author: Mitchell Brink
item.itunes:subtitle: Matthew shows how Jesus broke out of the box which humanity had made for him.

item.title: Persistence with Prayer
item.description: It is Biblical to come before God persistently with your requests until an answer is clearly given.
item.itunes:author: Mitchell Brink
item.itunes:subtitle: It is Biblical to come before God persistently with your requests until an answer is clearly given.

item.title: Make Me More Like You
item.description: Our prayers ought to be offered with absolute humility.
item.itunes:author: Mitchell Brink
item.itunes:subtitle: Our prayers ought to be offered with absolute humility.
